text:
......
There's nothing for me to drink...?

Ah! I also wanted a drink.
Want to go buy some with me?

Or, if you're okay with black tea,
I don't mind sharing with you.

Did you check in the 
back of the fridge?
I could also use a drink.

......
What do you think your looking at...
You know, I'm also pretty thristy.
Fufu... That's one more person on the order.

In that case, let's all go buy drinks.
My treat of course.
